generif.text: The encoded peptide displays antibacterial activity against Gram-negative but not Gram-positive bacteria, including P. aeruginosa and E. coli. In addition, this peptide is active against C. albicans.

name: defensin beta 4A

kegg.name: NOD-like receptor signaling pathway - Homo sapiens (human)

summary: Defensins form a family of microbicidal and cytotoxic peptides made by neutrophils. Members of the defensin family are highly similar in protein sequence. This gene encodes defensin, beta 4, an antibiotic peptide which is locally regulated by inflammation. [provided by RefSeq, Jul 2008].
